description:
AlterPhoto is a versatile photo editor with workflow elements. It supports layers, contains tools for color adjustment, retouching, transformation, drawing.

AlterPhoto is a versatile photo editor with workflow elements. It supports layers, contains tools for color adjustment, retouching, transformation, drawing.
Apply filters, use generative AI to change the areas, background, remove objects in the photo, enlarge the image. Create photo variants in one click.

Workflow: Support for 100+ formats, RAW importing, Photo comparison, Photo culling, Change history, Flexible export options
Color Adjustment: Contrast, exposure, gamma, Gray-scale balance, Negative, Black and white
Retouching: Healing tool, Clone tool, Smudge tool, Blur, motion blur, Unsharpen tool
Generative AI: Erase selected area, Replace selected area, Find and replace object, Find and recolor object, Remove the background, Replace the background
Filters: Denoise, smoothing, Sharpen, Bump map, Decoration, Custom filters, Texture, 3rd party 8bf filters supported
